benchmark_details.name: ProjectTest: A Project-level LLM Unit Test Generation Benchmark
benchmark_details.overview: ProjectTest is a project-level benchmark for unit test generation covering Python, Java, and JavaScript. It features 20 moderate-sized and high-quality projects per language, providing a comprehensive evaluation of LLMs' unit test generation capabilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a reliable and high-quality benchmark for evaluating unit test generation by LLMs.

data.source: GitHub repositories filtered based on specific criteria for selection.

methods: Evaluation of LLMs on generated unit tests
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of generated unit tests across different scenarios.
methodology.interpretation: Higher rates indicate better performance in generating valid and efficient unit tests.
methodology.baseline_results: Performance of nine frontier LLMs evaluated against ProjectTest.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: MIT, GPL-2.0, Apache-2.0 licenses for projects included.
